about_the_game:
Soulrise is a game about high-risk jumps, inspired by Jump King and other precision platformer.

Trapped beneath a forgotten tower, lost souls await your help. They must ascend to the top of this Structure, overcome challenging obstacles and uncover hidden secrets - you're their only chance of salvation. Every jump must be carefully considered, as there's a lot at stake... One mistake and your progress is set back by an unpleasant fall.




  • Experience Soulrise alone or with up to three friends
  • Rotate your sword 360° around your player to determine the direction of each jump
  • Hold and release at the right moment to give your jumps the necessary power
  • Explore a tower with 10 different sections and hidden secrets
  • Try to avoid mistakes... Every fall has serious consequences.




Experience Soulrise alone or with up to three friends. Explore the abandoned tower together to find the best path to the top.
Or compete against each other in a specially designed mode.

  • Adventure Mode: 1-4 players - Explore the tower together and exchange ideas to overcome difficult obstacles. Together you'll find the best way to the top!

  • Versus Mode: 1-4 players - Set a time limit and race against each other. Alternatively, set a goal and find out who can reach it the fastest!
